events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our technical team.
Your application has been reviewed and categorized under the Engineering department focusing on software development roles.
A recruiter specializing in technology roles has been assigned to assist you through the next steps of the hiring process.
Your credentials and experience have been positively reviewed in our initial screening for the software engineer role.
Thank you for promptly responding to our screening feedback. We are continuing to evaluate your suitability for the engineering position.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for April 16th, including coding tests and system design questions to assess your engineering skills.
